page.title: 04INDUSTRY:BOATS AND FISHING
page.content: If they aren't controlled,and that modern echo sounders make it too easy to find fish.The working boats at Looe are worth about Â£5 000 000.Trawl fish landed over two years was worth Â£1 250 000.There are forty-five tourist boats at Looe which sometimes take out anglers and sometimes just run trips to see the coast.There are four speedboats which run trips along the coast and a lot of small drive- yourself motor boats,as well as many private boats.We looked up recent fish market prices at Plymouth:-monkfish Â£18;cod Â£3.50;ling Â£2.50;conger Â£1.10; whiting Â£2;lemon sole Â£9.50;plaice Â£8.40;d over sole/turbot Â£22.40(all per st.)
